entered on: 3/24/21
Title: Express Med
Author: Emery NP, Rachel E

1.Loss of perception for smellR48.1, Loss of perception for tasteR48.1
Discussed with patient that she likely had COVID-19, but should no longer be contagious since it has been 2+ weekssince her initial symptoms; pt verbalized understanding. Recommended Tylenol for fever, body aches. Discussed symptom control and recommended cool-mist humidifier at bedside, sleeping prone and/or practicing prone positioning several times daily, salt water gargles, warm tea with honey, increased fluid intake, and rest. May take Vitamin C 1000mg daily, Zinc 50-100mg daily, probiotics, Vitamin D 5,000 units daily, and ASA 81mg daily. Pt to go to ER for worsening SOB, SOB at rest, or difficulty breathing; pt voiced understanding once again.
